align-self.type: auto / start / end / center / baseline / stretch
align-self.description: Applies the align-items css property. Available options are: start, center, end, auto, baseline and stretch.
align-self.description_zh: 应用 align-items css 属性。可用选项包括：开始、居中、结束、自动、基线和拉伸。

cols.description: Sets the default number of columns the component extends. Available options are: 1 -> 12 and auto.
cols.description_zh: 设置组件扩展的默认列数。可用选项有：1 -> 12 和自动。

lg.description: Change the number of columns on larger and larger breakpoints.
lg.description_zh: 在更大和更大的断点上更改列数。

md.description: Change the number of columns on medium and large breakpoints.
md.description_zh: 更改中等和较大断点上的列数。

offset.description: Sets the default offset for the column.

offset-lg.description: Change the offset of the component on larger and larger breakpoints.
offset-lg.description_zh: 在更大和更大的断点上更改组件的偏移量。

offset-md.description: Change the offset of the component at medium and higher breakpoints.
offset-md.description_zh: 在中等和更高的断点上更改组件的偏移量。

offset-sm.description: Change the offset of the component at smaller and larger breakpoints.
offset-sm.description_zh: 在较小和较大的断点处更改组件的偏移量。

offset-xl.description: Change the offset of the component at larger and larger breakpoints.
offset-xl.description_zh: 在更大和更大的断点处更改组件的偏移量。

offset-xxl.description: Changes the offset of the component on extra extra large and greater breakpoints.
offset-xxl.description_zh: 更改组件在超大和更大断点上的偏移量。

order.description: Sets the default order for the column

order-lg.description: Change the order of components on larger and larger breakpoints.
order-lg.description_zh: 在更大和更大的断点上更改组件的顺序。

order-md.description: Change the order of components at medium and higher breakpoints.
order-md.description_zh: 在中等和更高的断点上更改组件的顺序。

order-sm.description: Change the order of components on smaller and larger breakpoints.
order-sm.description_zh: 在较小和较大的断点上更改组件的顺序。

order-xl.description: Change the order of components on larger and larger breakpoints.
order-xl.description_zh: 在更大和更大的断点上更改组件的顺序。

order-xxl.description: Changes the order of the component on extra extra large and greater breakpoints.
order-xxl.description_zh: 更改组件在超大和更大断点上的顺序。

sm.description: Change the number of columns on smaller and larger breakpoints.
sm.description_zh: 在较小和较大的断点上更改列数。

tag.description: Specifies the custom tag to be used on the root element.
tag.description_zh: 指定在根元素上使用的自定义标签。

xl.description: Change the number of columns on larger and larger breakpoints.
xl.description_zh: 在更大和更大的断点上更改列数。

xxl.description: Changes the number of columns on extra extra large and greater breakpoints.
xxl.description_zh: 更改超大和更大断点上的列数。
